        "王妃": 85,
        "精灵": 89,
        "马甲": 266
    }
};

let datas = [
    {
        "title": "番茄官方书架",
        "url": "{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/bookshelf?cookie={{java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')}}",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "大灰狼阅读记录",
        "url": "{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/bookshelf?key={{source.getLoginInfoMap()['请输入密钥']}}",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "书籍排行榜 ٩( ˃̶͈̀௰˂̶͈́ )و",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "推荐榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=10',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "完结榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=11',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "热搜榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=12',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "黑马榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=13',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "爆更榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?side_type=15',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "巅峰榜单",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?type=0',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "男频精选",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?type=2',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "女频精选",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?type=3',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    },
    {
        "title": "每周推荐",
        "url": '{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?type=1',
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
        }
    }
];

function generateUrl(k, k1, sort, status) {
    return `{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?offset={{(page - 1) * 10}}&limit=10&tags=${data[k][k1]}&status=${status}&sort=${sort}`;
}

for (let k in data) {
    datas.push({
        "title": "❦ " + k + "生频道 ❧",
        "url": "",
        "style": {
            "layout_flexGrow": 1,
            "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
        }
    });
    for (let k1 in data[k]) {
        datas.push({
            "title": k1,
            "url": '',
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "推荐排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "已完结",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'Finished'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "连载中",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 0, 'Loading'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });

        datas.push({
            "title": "评分排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "已完结",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'Finished'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "连载中",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 1, 'Loading'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });

        datas.push({
            "title": "热门排行",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 2, 'ALL'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "已完结",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 2, 'Finished'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
        datas.push({
            "title": "连载中",
            "url": generateUrl(k, k1, 2, 'Loading'),
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.27
            }
        });
    }
}
JSON.stringify(datas);


</js>

bookSourceName: 番茄七猫等多平台阅读<大灰狼vip>
bookSourceComment:
支持番茄小说，QQ免费小说，熊猫小说，得间小说，七猫小说，起点69小说

更新说明：
登录页新增手动切换书籍来源选项按钮

ruleSearch.name: book_name

bookSourceComment:
支持番茄真人听书和Ai朗读，搜索时尽量输入书籍全名

新增喜马拉雅听书功能(打赏用户专享)

新增指定来源搜索
exploreUrl:
<js>
let datas = [
    {
        "title": "番茄官方书架",
        "url": "{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/bookshelf?cookie={{java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')}}",

function xmlyUrl(datatype,metadataValues) {
    return `{{source.bookSourceUrl}}/discover?datatype=${datatype}&metadataValues=${metadataValues}`;
}


let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.ximalaya.com/revision/category/v2/metadata/info?categoryId=3,'+JSON.stringify({headers: {"user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36"}})));

let data = res.data.metadata;

data.forEach(i => {
    const metadataValues1 = i.metadataValues || [];
    metadataValues1.forEach(j => {
        const metadataValues2 = j.metadataValues || [];
        const displayName = j.displayName || "";

        if (metadataValues2.length > 0) {
            

            const myself = {
                title: `❦ 喜马拉雅${displayName} ❧`,
                url: xmlyUrl(displayName, ""),
                style: {
                    layout_flexGrow: 1,
                    layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
                }
            };
            datas.push(myself);

            metadataValues2.forEach(l => {
                const metadataValues3 = l.metadataValues || [];
                metadataValues3.forEach(k => {
                    const name = k.name || "";

                    const myself2 = {
                        title: name,
                        url: xmlyUrl(displayName, name),
                        style: {
                            layout_flexGrow: 1,
                            layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.27
                        }
                    };
                    datas.push(myself2);
                });
            });
        }
    });
});

JSON.stringify(datas)
</js>
